name: The Descent (itch) (Fontys Game Design & Technology, JensNCLS, RoelWalraven)
name_original: The Descent (itch) (Fontys Game Design & Technology, JensNCLS, RoelWalraven)
description:
The Descent (itch) (Fontys Game Design & Technology, JensNCLS, RoelWalraven) is a platformer game developed by Fontys Game Design & Technology, JensNCLS and RoelWalraven. It was originally released in 2021.
The Descent (itch) (Fontys Game Design & Technology, JensNCLS, RoelWalraven) is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
